message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $13000. This is a great deal, considering the value it will bring to your business.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the market value.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $11000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $12500. This is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $11500 for the product. I believe that's a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $13000, which is still a great deal considering the value it will bring to your business. I'm not willing to go below $13000, as it's the minimum I'm willing to accept for this product.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $12000 for the product. I believe that's a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.
